AT.name: Kirby 64™ The Crystal Shards
AT.description: In Kirbys erstem 3D-Abenteuer muss der pinke Held in den Sternen jenseits des Dream Land seine Freunde vor einem neuen Feind retten: Dark Matter. Dieses süße Jump ’n’ Run erfreut das Herz eines jeden Kirby-Fans. Schlucke Feinde, um ihre Spezial-Power nachzuahmen - z. B. Feuer, Eis oder Elektro - oder zu mixen, um Powercombos zu erhalten. Die Ergebnisse werden dich überraschen! Erkunde Planeten aus Lava, Wasser oder sogar Süßigkeiten und bekämpfe auf deiner Suche nach den Crystal Shards riesige Bosse. Kirby 64 hält auch drei Bonus-Minispiele für bis zu vier Spieler bereit. Wenn du diesen Titel bereits auf deiner Wii™ erworben hast, führe einen System-Transfer von deiner Wii auf deine Wii U™ durch, um ein Upgrade-Sonderangebot zu erhalten. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Kirby 64™: The Crystal Shards
AU.description: Kirby’s first 3D adventure sees the powerful pink hero go beyond Dream Land and into the stars, to save his friends from a deadly new enemy: Dark Matter. This cute, colourful platformer features all the Kirby action you could wish for. Swallow enemies to copy their abilities – like fire, ice or electricity – or mix and match to create Power Combos. Try them all for surprising results! Explore planets made of lava, water or even sweets; and battle giant bosses as you seek out the scattered Crystal Shards. Kirby 64 also includes three bonus minigames for up to four players. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Kirby 64™: The Crystal Shards
BG.description: Kirby’s first 3D adventure sees the powerful pink hero go beyond Dream Land and into the stars, to save his friends from a deadly new enemy: Dark Matter. This cute, colourful platformer features all the Kirby action you could wish for. Swallow enemies to copy their abilities – like fire, ice or electricity – or mix and match to create Power Combos. Try them all for surprising results! Explore planets made of lava, water or even sweets; and battle giant bosses as you seek out the scattered Crystal Shards. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Kirby 64™ The Crystal Shards
BE.description: Dans sa première aventure en 3D, Kirby se rend au-delà de Dream Land pour sauver ses amis d'un nouvel ennemi : le terrible Matière Noire. Dans ce décor frais et coloré, Kirby peut avaler ses ennemis pour copier leurs capacités, comme le feu ou la glace, et les associer pour créer des effets encore plus puissants. Essayez-les toutes, le résultat sera surprenant ! Explorez des planètes faites de lave, d'eau ou encore de bonbons, et affrontez des boss géants tout en cherchant les éclats de cristaux. Kirby 64 offre également trois mini-jeux bonus pouvant rassembler jusqu'à quatre joueurs. Si vous possédez ce titre sur votre Wii, faites un transfert Wii™ vers votre Wii U™ afin d'obtenir la version améliorée à un prix spécial ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

CA.name: Kirby 64™: The Crystal Shards
CA.description: Kirby™ stars in his first 3D adventure, which is also his Nintendo 64™ debut. This game finds the always-versatile hero battling a new enemy called Dark Matter. Dark Matter is after a distant land's powerful crystal, but a young fairy named Ribbon attempts to save it by escaping with the gem to Dream Land. Now the crystal has been broken, and it's scattered around the world. Take control of Kirby, and help him journey across six worlds, battling a wide variety of enemies and challenging bosses, as he tries to collect all 100 pieces of the shattered crystal. Along the way, you'll use Kirby's trademark Copy Ability to use enemies' strengths against them. Not only that, but try combining any two abilities to create a brand-new one that is usually stronger than the original. Throw in three exciting multiplayer minigames, and you've got a package of which even King Dedede would be proud. Fans of Kirby and action games with bright, colorful graphics should vacuum this one up.

ES.name: Kirby 64™ The Crystal Shards
ES.description: La primera aventura 3D de Kirby te llevará más allá de Dream Land, a las estrellas, para salvar a sus amigos de un nuevo y mortífero enemigo: Materia oscura. Este bonito juego de plataformas está lleno de color y acción a partes iguales. Trágate a tus enemigos para copiar sus habilidades (fuego, hielo, electricidad...) y crea poderosas combinaciones. ¡Pruébalas todas! Busca los fragmentos de cristal por planetas de lava, agua o incluso dulces y enfréntate a enormes jefes. Kirby 64 también incluye tres minijuegos extra en los que pueden participar hasta cuatro jugadores. Si posees este título en tu Wii™, puedes realizar una transferencia de datos de Wii a Wii U™ y obtener una actualización a un precio especial. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Kirby 64™ The Crystal Shards
IT.description: La prima avventura di Kirby in 3D, porta il nostro eroe rosa oltre i confini del regno di Dream Land per salvare i suoi amici da una nuova minaccia: Dark Matter. Questo tenero platform dai mille colori è pieno di azione; ingoia i nemici per copiare le loro abilità (fuoco, ghiaccio, elettricità) o combinale tra loro per creare potenti combo con risultati sorprendenti! Esplorerai pianeti fatti di lava, acqua o persino dolci e affronterai boss colossali per trovare i frammenti di cristallo! Inoltre, Kirby 64 include tre minigiochi bonus ai quali possono partecipare fino a quattro giocatori. Se possiedi questo titolo sulla tua console Wii™, effettua un trasferimento dati su Wii U™ per potere ottenere la versione ottimizzata a un prezzo speciale! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

MT.description: Kirby’s first 3D adventure sees the powerful pink hero go beyond Dream Land and into the stars, to save his friends from a deadly new enemy: Dark Matter. This is the US version of the game.

MX.name: Kirby 64™: The Crystal Shards
MX.description: La primera aventura en 3D de Kirby es también su debut en Nintendo 64, donde el versátil héroe lucha contra un nuevo enemigo llamado Dark Matter. Dark Matter está tras un poderoso cristal de una tierra lejana, pero una joven hada llamada Ribbon intenta salvarlo escapando de Dream Land con la gema. Ahora el cristal está roto y se ha dispersado por todo el mundo. Toma control de Kirby y ayúdalo en su travesía a través de seis mundos, luchando contra una gran variedad de enemigos y jefes desafiantes mientras trata de recolectar las 100 piezas del cristal roto. Por el camino, usarás la conocida cualidad de Kirby para copiar las habilidades de sus enemigos y usarlas contra ellos. Además, trata de combinar dos habilidades para crear una nueva que usualmente es más fuerte que la original. Finalmente, tres divertidos minijuegos multijugador son incluidos en este paquete de cual hasta el Rey Dedede estaría orgulloso. Los Fanáticos de Kirby, de los juegos de acción y de coloridos gráficos no se lo pueden perder.

NO.name: Kirby 64™: The Crystal Shards
NO.description: Kirby’s first 3D adventure sees the powerful pink hero go beyond Dream Land and into the stars, to save his friends from a deadly new enemy: Dark Matter. This cute, colourful platformer features all the Kirby action you could wish for. Swallow enemies to copy their abilities – like fire, ice or electricity – or mix and match to create Power Combos. Try them all for surprising results! Explore planets made of lava, water or even sweets; and battle giant bosses as you seek out the scattered Crystal Shards. Kirby 64 also includes three bonus minigames for up to four players. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: Kirby 64™ The Crystal Shards
NL.description: In Kirby's eerste 3D-avontuur gaat de krachtige roze held naar de sterren, om zijn vrienden van een nieuwe vijand te redden: Dark Matter. Dit schattige, kleurrijke platformspel bevat alle Kirby-actie die je maar kunt wensen. Slik vijanden door om hun vaardigheden over te nemen, of maak krachtige combinaties van vaardigheden. Verras jezelf door te experimenteren! Verken planeten van lava, water of zelfs snoepjes, en vecht tegen gigantische eindbazen tijdens je zoektocht naar de kristallen scherven. Kirby 64 bevat ook drie bonus-minispellen voor maximaal vier spelers. Als je deze titel hebt gekocht op je Wii™, kom je in aanmerking voor een speciale upgrade-prijs als je je gegevens overzet van Wii naar Wii U™. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Kirby 64™: The Crystal Shards
NZ.description: Kirby’s first 3D adventure sees the powerful pink hero go beyond Dream Land and into the stars, to save his friends from a deadly new enemy: Dark Matter. This cute, colourful platformer features all the Kirby action you could wish for. Swallow enemies to copy their abilities – like fire, ice or electricity – or mix and match to create Power Combos. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Kirby 64™ The Crystal Shards
PT.description: A primeira aventura 3D de Kirby levará o nosso herói além da Dream Land para salvar os seus amigos de um novo inimigo: Dark Matter. Este colorido jogo de plataformas está repleto de ação. Engole inimigos para copiar as suas habilidades – fogo, gelo ou electricidade – ou combina habilidades diferentes para criar Power Combos. Experimenta todas e poderás surpreender-te! Explora planetas de lava, de água ou até de doces e combate inimigos gigantes enquanto procuras os Crystal Shards. Kirby 64 também inclui três minijogos de bónus para até quatro jogadores. Caso já tenha adquirido este título para a sua Wii, faça uma transferência de dados da sua Wii™ para a sua Wii U™ com atualizações a um preço especial. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Kirby 64™ The Crystal Shards
RU.description: В своем первом 3D приключении наш розовый герой Кирби отправится за пределы Страны снов, чтобы спасти своих друзей от нового врага: Темной материи. Вы получите много удовольствия, играя в этот милый, радужный платформер. Проглатывайте врагов чтобы имитировать их способности (огонь, лед, электричество) или смешивайте их в комбо атаки. Вас ждет немало сюрпризов! Исследуйте планеты состоящие из лавы, воды и даже сладостей. Сражайтесь с гигантскими врагами в поисках потерявшихся осколков кристалла. Kirby 64 также включает в себя три бонусных мини игры (до четырех игроков). Если вы приобрели игру на Wii™, вы можете передать ее на консоль Wii U™ и получить скидку на обновление игры до версии Wii U. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

SE.description: Kirby’s first 3D adventure sees the powerful pink hero go beyond Dream Land and into the stars, to save his friends from a deadly new enemy: Dark Matter. US.name: Kirby 64™: The Crystal Shards
US.description: Kirby™ stars in his first 3D adventure, which is also his Nintendo 64™ debut. This game finds the always-versatile hero battling a new enemy called Dark Matter. Dark Matter is after a distant land's powerful crystal, but a young fairy named Ribbon attempts to save it by escaping with the gem to Dream Land. Now the crystal has been broken, and it's scattered around the world. Take control of Kirby, and help him journey across six worlds, battling a wide variety of enemies and challenging bosses, as he tries to collect all 100 pieces of the shattered crystal. Along the way, you'll use Kirby's trademark Copy Ability to use enemies' strengths against them. Not only that, but try combining any two abilities to create a brand-new one that is usually stronger than the original. Throw in three exciting multiplayer minigames, and you've got a package of which even King Dedede would be proud. Fans of Kirby and action games with bright, colorful graphics should vacuum this one up.

ZA.name: Kirby 64™: The Crystal Shards
ZA.description: Kirby’s first 3D adventure sees the powerful pink hero go beyond Dream Land and into the stars, to save his friends from a deadly new enemy: Dark Matter. This cute, colourful platformer features all the Kirby action you could wish for. Swallow enemies to copy their abilities – like fire, ice or electricity – or mix and match to create Power Combos. Try them all for surprising results! Explore planets made of lava, water or even sweets; and battle giant bosses as you seek out the scattered Crystal Shards. Kirby 64 also includes three bonus minigames for up to four players. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.
